P5721 【深基4.例6】数字直角三角形

Written on December 26th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,ans=0;
    cin>>n;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(int j=1;j<=n-i+1;j++)
        {
            ans++;
            if(ans<10)
                cout<<0<<ans;
            else
                cout<<ans;
        }
        cout<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
